An HTML iframe is used to display a web page within a web page. To remove the border, add the style attribute and use the CSS border property: Example With CSS, you can also change the size, style and color of the iframe's border: Example Iframe - Target for a Link An iframe can be used as the target frame for a link. The target attribute of the link must refer to the name attribute of the iframe: Example
